text: [Say] �Praise be to God and peace be on His servants whom He has chosen...�He said:Peace from God attaches itself to the people of the Qurʾān in this life according to His saying, peace be on His servants; while peace [for them] in the next life [is indicated by] His saying �Peace!� the word from the Lord [who is] Merciful [36:58].His words, Exalted is He:
